this_title: Easter Bunny Bloodbath 2: No More Tears
trans_title: 复活节兔子血洗浴2：不再有眼泪
introduction: Long traumatized and recovering after a horrific Easter five years earlier, a girl slowly goes insane and deranged when she realizes that HER ATTACKER IS STILL ALIVE. Trying to right wrongs while still maintaining her sanity, it isn't long before she snaps and raises Hell on a brand new Easter weekend. Added to the mix is a Federal Bigfoot Investigator who'll stop at nothing getting revenge on the hairy manhandling Beast who stole his manhood. It's BIGFOOT VS BUNNY in "EASTER BUNNY BLOODBATH 2: NO MORE TEARS!" - and you don't have to see Part 1.
chinese_title: 复活节兔子血洗浴2：不再有眼泪
foreign_title: Easter Bunny Bloodbath 2: No More Tears
